name: Quick Thinking
description:
Quick Thinking

The game is an education endless running game with obstacles that the players must jump over or avoid. After certain number of obstacles, the players will be faced with a question. Successfully answering this question will let the players continue onward, while failure will result in end game.  
 
The game is basically about a character exploring a certain place while running away from something/someone. We divide the game into a few categories, based on the subject of the question. The stage theme will be based on the subject. For example, the mathematics stage will be in a futuristic ruin, while the English stage will be in a snowy England. 
 
Core Gameplay Mechanics 
 
❖ Movement The character has 3 types of movement, run, jump and slide for Android & Arrow keys for Windows version. The character will automatically run, controlled by the game, while the player only need to control when to jump and slide. 
 
❖ Scoring The game score based on how long the player can survive the game. 
 
❖ Question At certain points of the game, there will be questions that the player must answer. To answer the question, the player must choose one answer out of two given possible answers.
